statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.Code , AA.ValueType , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
, M1.Name as ValueTypeName
FROM dbo.TAttributeType AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ValueType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'ValueType' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TAttributeType AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TAttributeType ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, Code, ValueType, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #Code#, #ValueType#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TAttributeType SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , Code = #Code# , ValueType = #ValueType# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
